physical_examinations.vital_signs: Fever, tachypnea, low-grade fever, weight loss of 60 lbs over 1 year.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Oral candidiasis, decreased air entry bilaterally on lung examination, bilateral interstitial pneumonia on chest radiography.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient's weight loss and respiratory symptoms progressed over time, with multiple visits for oral candidiasis before diagnosis of HIV.
